name: Evening Vibes
description:
The game takes place in China. You find yourself on outskirts of Guangzhou, where in the evening you will meet a little girl who lost her mother...

From this moment on, very strange things will begin to happen to you.

This is a first-person horror game that is controlled using the keyboard and mouse or joystick. It tells about the fate of 3 people and their stories, who during the game became hostages of a terrible demon.

You have to look for clues, get out of traps, communicate with characters, save a girl and defeat the ancient evil.

Features:
  • Atmospheric Chinese town.
  • Unique characters.
  • Mystical environment.
  • Responsive controls.
  • Addictive gameplay.
  • Good optimization.
